job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Nova Biomedical is looking for a Software Engineer join our RampD department in Waltham MA This is a terrific opportunity for a college graduate to launch a career with an established medical device company  to learn contribute and growbrbrWe are open to hiring for this role at entry or midlevel It could also be an opportunity for an experienced embedded software engineer to continue a career by contributing to a company that has an impact in peoples lives around the worldbrbrNovas product portfolio includes technologies currently being implemented in the clinical treatment of COVID 19 patients and by major biotherapeutic companies for vaccine development Please note that this is an onsite position working fulltime in our Waltham MA officebrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli Working as part of the Product Development team in this role you will design and develop software to control complex electromechanicaloptical subassemblies lili Development projects have a large variety of technologies used including BLE Bluetooth Low Energy system WiFi microcontrollers motion control and vision systems brliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulli Bachelors degree in Computer Science Software Engineering or Electrical Engineering lili Object oriented programming background lili Experience with C C and C brliulAt Nova Biomedical we practice our core values of mutual respect honesty and integrity throughout the company With a strong sense of family in the workplace we are proud that one third of all our employees have been with us for over 10 yearsbrbrHighlights of benefits offered to Nova Biomedical employees include Blue Cross Blue Shield medical plan tuition reimbursement matching 401K company subsidized cafeteria and an innovative scholarship program for children of employees
